live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
56365.summary: Some customers in Dawson Creek, and those in Fort St. John are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56365.title: Dec 21 - Dawson Creek, Fort St. John | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
